scan_metadata.description: mq - Compliance Functions Mapping - OPTIMIZED VERSION
scan_metadata.optimization_notes: Intelligently categorized functions by cloud security expert analysis, grouped by service, simplified to 4 clear categories with execution types and remediation effort classification

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check if broker is in active deployment mode

check_functions.description: Checks if auto minor version upgrades are enabled for broker

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check if broker is deployed in cluster mode
check_functions.description: Verifies broker is deployed in cluster mode

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check if logging is enabled for broker

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check if broker is not publicly accessible
